## What

Describe what your change does.
(e.g., "I added a new user to the python-api list" or "I fixed a typo in the web dashboard")

## Why

Explain why this change is needed.
(e.g., "The current list of users was too short for testing" or "The typo was confusing for users")

## How

Briefly explain how you implemented the change.
(e.g., "I edited the `users` list in `main.py`")

## Testing

How did you check that your code works?
(e.g., "I ran `python main.py` and saw the new user in the output")
